scripts.test:chrome: http-server -p 8081 & sleep 5 & npx testcafe chrome test && pkill -f "http-server"
scripts.test:chromeheadless: http-server -p 8081 & sleep 5 & npx testcafe chrome:headless test && pkill -f "http-server"
scripts.test:ff: http-server -p 8081 & sleep 5 & npx testcafe firefox test && pkill -f "http-server"
scripts.test:ffheadless: http-server -p 8081 & sleep 5 & npx testcafe firefox:headless test && pkill -f "http-server"
scripts.test:customreport: http-server -p 8081 & sleep 5 & npx testcafe chrome test --reporter html:./reports/report_$(date +"%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S").html && pkill -f "http-server"
scripts.test:ghactions: http-server -p 8081 & sleep 5 & npx testcafe chrome:headless test
